mdRecord.dcterms:title: 34086 A Nation's Shrine from the air--Home of Washington, Founder of the Republic, Mt. Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic aerial view of the Mount Vernon estate. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the mount reads: Keystone View Company, Manufacturers, Publishers. Copyrighted, made in U. S. A. Meadville, Pal, New York, N. Y., Chicago, Ill., London, England. Title - 34086 A Nation's Shrine from the Air--Home of Washington, Founder of the Republic, Mt. Vernon. Va. Printed directly on the back of the mount is a short history of the estate - 29574 Home of Washington, Founder of Republic, Mt. Vernon, Va. Copyright by the Keystone View Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
